page.title: 04ANTRIM'S MAYOR
page.content: There has been a Mayor in Antrim for eight years ever since the town became a borough. Mr.Allen himself has been leader or Antrim Council for thirteen years and has enjoyed all the years as Mayor of Antrim. His chain of office was donated to Antrim by British Enkalon when Antrim became a borough and it is made of gold. It is kept in the Council offices at the Steeple and it is worth eight to ten thousand pounds.Mr.Allen thinks that the main aspect of being mayor is to be able to lead his council strictly, he also thinks that the most enjoyable part of his job is being able to meet strange people.The changes over Mr.Allen's years as mayor have been tremendous. The village started with 4000 people and increased quickly to OVER 25000. Mr.Allen sums up his years as exciting and interesting.
